类 Problem

java.lang.Object
com.shapeville.model.Problem
public class Problem extends Object
A generic container for the data representing a single problem or question presented to the user in a task. The specific content held within depends on the type of task. Used to pass problem details from the task logic to the UI panel.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • Problem

      public Problem(String taskId, String questionText, Object problemData)
      Constructs a new Problem object.
      参数:
      taskId - The identifier for the task this problem belongs to.
      questionText - The textual question or instruction for the user.
      problemData - An object containing the specific data for this problem (e.g., a Shape object, dimensions).

  • 方法详细资料

    • getTaskId

      public String getTaskId()
      Gets the identifier of the task this problem belongs to.
      返回:
      The task ID.

    • getQuestionText

      public String getQuestionText()
      Gets the textual question or instruction for this problem.
      返回:
      The question text.

    • getProblemData

      public Object getProblemData()
      Gets the raw problem data object. The actual type of this object depends on the specific task.
      返回:
      The problem data object.

    • getProblemDataAs

      public <T> T getProblemDataAs(Class<T> type)
      Gets the problem data object cast to a specific type. Use this method to safely retrieve the specific data type expected by the task panel.
      类型参数:
      T - The target type to cast the problem data to.
      参数:
      type - The Class object representing the target type.
      返回:
      The problem data cast to the target type, or null if the data is null or not an instance of the target type.
